name: Sitnayoy
description:
Sitnayoy is my windowly-looking game, remake of the android game Antiyoy, itself based on Slay. On top of Antiyoy rules, Sitnayoy adds new 2 new objects - Archersand Mountains, allows more rule customizations, better editor and replay features, ability to play single or multiplayer via LAN or the Internet.

The game can be main played as a strategy, simulation or drawing game. There are tutorials for new and for already familiar with Antiyoy players. 

The graphics are all from Antiyoy, but I'm actively looking to changing them.
